3.name: Red Skeleton
3.ABI: Screams at player, DEX save or -2 AC next round

4.name: Many-Eyed Snail
4.ABI: After being attacked with melee or spell: (1) INT save or have spell reflected back to user (2) CON save or for 1 round: Attacks against target have advantage, Snail cannot move while this is active

5.name: Lost Visage
5.ABI: CON save or for 1 round: Attacks against target have advantage and attacks with disadvantage
